method: Bring the apples, onions, garlic, lemon juice, mustard seed and 590ml/1 pint of vinegar to the boil. Simmer for 1 hour. Add the raisins, ginger, salt, sugar and the rest of the vinegar. Simmer until thick. Pour into clean, hot jam jars and cover as usual. Store for 6-8 weeks to allow the flavours to develop.
ingredients: 1.8kg/4lb apples, peeled, cored and chopped,  4 medium onions, peeled and finely chopped,  2 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed,  1 lemon, juice only,  1 tbsp mustard seeds,  900ml/1Â½ pint vinegar (cider or malt),  450g/1lb raisins,  1 tbsp ground ginger,  2 tsp salt,  900g/2lb soft brown sugar
